ids.description: The ids of the elements in the combobox. Useful for composition.

inputValue.description: The controlled value of the combobox's input

defaultInputValue.description:
The initial value of the combobox's input when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the combobox's input.

name.description: The `name` attribute of the combobox's input. Useful for form submission

form.description: The associate form of the combobox.

readOnly.description:
Whether the combobox is readonly. This puts the combobox in a "non-editable" mode
but the user can still interact with it

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the combobox's input

defaultHighlightedValue.description:
The initial highlighted value of the combobox when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the highlighted value of the combobox.

highlightedValue.description: The controlled highlighted value of the combobox

value.description: The controlled value of the combobox's selected items

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the combobox's selected items when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the combobox's selected items.

inputBehavior.description:
Defines the auto-completion behavior of the combobox.

- `autohighlight`: The first focused item is highlighted as the user types
- `autocomplete`: Navigating the listbox with the arrow keys selects the item and the input is updated

selectionBehavior.description:
The behavior of the combobox input when an item is selected

- `replace`: The selected item string is set as the input value
- `clear`: The input value is cleared
- `preserve`: The input value is preserved

autoFocus.description: Whether to autofocus the input on mount

openOnClick.description: Whether to open the combobox popup on initial click on the input

openOnChange.description: Whether to show the combobox when the input value changes

allowCustomValue.description: Whether to allow typing custom values in the input

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the items

positioning.description: The positioning options to dynamically position the menu

onInputValueChange.description: Function called when the input's value changes

onValueChange.description: Function called when a new item is selected

onHighlightChange.description:
Function called when an item is highlighted using the pointer
or keyboard navigation.

onSelect.description: Function called when an item is selected

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the popup is opened

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

multiple.description:
Whether to allow multiple selection.

**Good to know:** When `multiple` is `true`, the `selectionBehavior` is automatically set to `clear`.
It is recommended to render the selected items in a separate container.

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close the combobox when an item is selected.

openOnKeyPress.description: Whether to open the combobox on arrow key press

scrollToIndexFn.description: Function to scroll to a specific index

composite.description: Whether the combobox is a composed with other composite widgets like tabs

disableLayer.description: Whether to disable registering this a dismissable layer

navigate.description: Function to navigate to the selected item

open.description: Whether the date picker is open

view.description: The current view of the date picker

getDaysInWeek.description: Returns an array of days in the week index counted from the provided start date, or the first visible date if not given.

getOffset.description: Returns the offset of the month based on the provided number of months.

getRangePresetValue.description: Returns the range of dates based on the provided date range preset.

getMonthWeeks.description: Returns the weeks of the month from the provided date. Represented as an array of arrays of dates.

isUnavailable.description: Returns whether the provided date is available (or can be selected)

weeks.description: The weeks of the month. Represented as an array of arrays of dates.

weekDays.description: The days of the week. Represented as an array of strings.

visibleRangeText.description: The human readable text for the visible range of dates.

value.description: The selected date.

valueAsDate.description: The selected date as a Date object.

valueAsString.description: The selected date as a string.

focusedValueAsDate.description: The focused date as a Date object.

focusedValueAsString.description: The focused date as a string.

selectToday.description: Sets the selected date to today.

setValue.description: Sets the selected date to the given date.

setFocusedValue.description: Sets the focused date to the given date.

setOpen.description: Function to open or close the calendar.

focusMonth.description: Function to set the selected month.

focusYear.description: Function to set the selected year.

getYears.description: Returns the months of the year

getYearsGrid.description:
Returns the years of the decade based on the columns.
Represented as an array of arrays of years.

getDecade.description: Returns the start and end years of the decade.

getMonths.description: Returns the months of the year

getMonthsGrid.description:
Returns the months of the year based on the columns.
Represented as an array of arrays of months.

format.description: Formats the given date value based on the provided options.

setView.description: Sets the view of the date picker.

getDayTableCellState.description: Returns the state details for a given cell.

getMonthTableCellState.description: Returns the state details for a given month cell.

getYearTableCellState.description: Returns the state details for a given year cell.

locale.description: The locale (BCP 47 language tag) to use when formatting the date.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the date picker. Useful for composition.

name.description: The `name` attribute of the input element.

min.description: The minimum date that can be selected.

max.description: The maximum date that can be selected.

closeOnSelect.description:
Whether the calendar should close after the date selection is complete.
This is ignored when the selection mode is `multiple`.

value.description: The controlled selected date(s).

defaultValue.description:
The initial selected date(s) when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected date(s) of the date picker.

defaultFocusedValue.description:
The initial focused date when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the focused date of the date picker.

numOfMonths.description: The number of months to display.

startOfWeek.description:
The first day of the week.
 `0` - Sunday
 `1` - Monday
 `2` - Tuesday
 `3` - Wednesday
 `4` - Thursday
 `5` - Friday
 `6` - Saturday

fixedWeeks.description:
Whether the calendar should have a fixed number of weeks.
This renders the calendar with 6 weeks instead of 5 or 6.

onFocusChange.description: Function called when the focused date changes.

onViewChange.description: Function called when the view changes.

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the calendar opens or closes.

isDateUnavailable.description: Returns whether a date of the calendar is available.

selectionMode.description:
The selection mode of the calendar.
- `single` - only one date can be selected
- `multiple` - multiple dates can be selected
- `range` - a range of dates can be selected

parse.description: Function to parse the date from the input back to a DateValue.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text to display in the input.

maxView.description: The maximum view of the calendar

Use when you don't need to control the open state of the date picker.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode for the preview element.

- "focus" - Enter edit mode when the preview is focused
- "dblclick" - Enter edit mode when the preview is double-clicked
- "click" - Enter edit mode when the preview is clicked

submitMode.description:
The action that triggers submit in the edit mode:

- "enter" - Trigger submit when the enter key is pressed
- "blur" - Trigger submit when the editable is blurred
- "none" - No action will trigger submit. You need to use the submit button
- "both" - Pressing `Enter` and blurring the input will trigger submit

selectOnFocus.description: Whether to select the text in the input when it is focused.

edit.description: Whether the editable is in edit mode.

selectAll.description:
Function to select all values.

**Note**: This should only be called when the selectionMode is `multiple` or `extended`.
Otherwise, an exception will be thrown.

clearValue.description:
Function to clear the value of the select.
If a value is provided, it will only clear that value, otherwise, it will clear all values.

defaultHighlightedValue.description:
The initial value of the highlighted item when opened.
Use when you don't need to control the highlighted value of the listbox.

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the options

selectionMode.description:
How multiple selection should behave in the listbox.

- `single`: The user can select a single item.
- `multiple`: The user can select multiple items without using modifier keys.
- `extended`: The user can select multiple items by using modifier keys.

selectOnHighlight.description: Whether to select the item when it is highlighted

typeahead.description: Whether to enable typeahead on the listbox

modal.description:
Whether the popover should be modal. When set to `true`:
- interaction with outside elements will be disabled
- only popover content will be visible to screen readers
- scrolling is blocked
- focus is trapped within the popover

portalled.description:
Whether the popover is portalled. This will proxy the tabbing behavior regardless of the DOM position
of the popover content.

autoFocus.description:
Whether to automatically set focus on the first focusable
content within the popover when opened.

initialFocusEl.description: The element to focus on when the popover is opened.

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the popover when the user clicks outside of the popover.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider

max.description: The maximum value of the slider

step.description: The step value of the slider

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

origin.description:
The origin of the slider range. The track is filled from the origin
to the thumb for single values.
- "start": Useful when the value represents an absolute value
- "center": Useful when the value represents an offset (relative)
- "end": Useful when the value represents an offset from the end

thumbAlignment.description:
The alignment of the slider thumb relative to the track
- `center`: the thumb will extend beyond the bounds of the slider track.
- `contain`: the thumb will be contained within the bounds of the track.

focus.description: Set focus on the selected tab trigger

getTriggerState.description: Returns the state of the trigger with the given props

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; trigger: string; list: string; content: string; indicator: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tabs. Useful for composition.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

loopFocus.description: Whether the keyboard navigation will loop from last tab to first, and vice versa.

value.description: The controlled selected tab value

defaultValue.description:
The initial selected tab value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected tab value.

orientation.description:
The orientation of the tabs. Can be `horizontal` or `vertical`
- `horizontal`: only left and right arrow key navigation will work.
- `vertical`: only up and down arrow key navigation will work.

activationMode.description:
The activation mode of the tabs. Can be `manual` or `automatic`
- `manual`: Tabs are activated when clicked or press `enter` key.
- `automatic`: Tabs are activated when receiving focus

onValueChange.description: Callback to be called when the selected/active tab changes

onFocusChange.description: Callback to be called when the focused tab changes

deselectable.description: Whether the active tab can be deselected when clicking on it.

navigate.description:
Function to navigate to the selected tab when clicking on it.
Useful if tab triggers are anchor elements.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

inputValue.description: The value of the tags entry input.

value.description: The value of the tags as an array of strings.

valueAsString.description: The value of the tags as a string.

atMax.description: Whether the tags have reached the max limit.

setValue.description: Function to set the value of the tags.

clearValue.description: Function to clear the value of the tags.

addValue.description: Function to add a tag to the tags.

setValueAtIndex.description: Function to set the value of a tag at the given index.

setInputValue.description: Function to set the value of the tags entry input.

clearInputValue.description: Function to clear the value of the tags entry input.

focus.description: Function to focus the tags entry input.

getItemState.description: Returns the state of a tag

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; input: string; hiddenInput: string; clearBtn: string; label: string; control: string; item(opts: ItemProps): string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tags input. Useful for composition.

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

maxLength.description: The max length of the input.

delimiter.description:
The character that serves has:
- event key to trigger the addition of a new tag
- character used to split tags when pasting into the input

autoFocus.description: Whether the input should be auto-focused

disabled.description: Whether the tags input should be disabled

readOnly.description: Whether the tags input should be read-only

invalid.description: Whether the tags input is invalid

required.description: Whether the tags input is required

editable.description: Whether a tag can be edited after creation, by pressing `Enter` or double clicking.

defaultInputValue.description:
The initial tag input value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the tag input value.

value.description: The controlled tag value

defaultValue.description:
The initial tag value when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the tag value.

onValueChange.description: Callback fired when the tag values is updated

onInputValueChange.description: Callback fired when the input value is updated

onHighlightChange.description: Callback fired when a tag is highlighted by pointer or keyboard navigation

onValueInvalid.description: Callback fired when the max tag count is reached or the `validateTag` function returns `false`

validate.description:
Returns a boolean that determines whether a tag can be added.
Useful for preventing duplicates or invalid tag values.

blurBehavior.description:
The behavior of the tags input when the input is blurred
- `"add"`: add the input value as a new tag
- `"clear"`: clear the input value

addOnPaste.description: Whether to add a tag when you paste values into the tag input

allowOverflow.description:
Whether to allow tags to exceed max. In this case,
we'll attach `data-invalid` to the root

name.description: The name attribute for the input. Useful for form submissions

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

open.description: Whether the time picker is open

value.description: The selected time

valueAsString.description: The selected time as a string

hour12.description: Whether the time picker is in 12-hour format (based on the locale prop)

reposition.description: Function to reposition the time picker content

setOpen.description: Function to open the time picker

clearValue.description: Function to clear the selected time

setValue.description: Function to set the selected time

setUnitValue.description: Function to set the focused time unit

getHours.description: Get the available hours that will be displayed in the time picker

getMinutes.description: Get the available minutes that will be displayed in the time picker

getSeconds.description: Get the available seconds that will be displayed in the time picker

locale.description: The locale (BCP 47 language tag) to use when formatting the time.

value.description: The controlled selected time.

defaultValue.description:
The initial selected time when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected time.

open.description: Whether the timepicker is open

defaultOpen.description: Whether the timepicker open state is controlled by the user

ids.type: Partial<{ trigger: string; input: string; positioner: string; content: string; clearTrigger: string; control: string; column(unit: TimeUnit): string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the date picker. Useful for composition.

name.description: The `name` attribute of the input element.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the time picker content

placeholder.description: The placeholder text of the input.

disabled.description: Whether the time picker is disabled.

readOnly.description: Whether the time picker is read-only.

min.description: The minimum time that can be selected.

max.description: The maximum time that can be selected.

steps.type: { hour?: number; minute?: number; second?: number; }
steps.description: The steps of each time unit.

onValueChange.description: Function called when the value changes.

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the time picker opens or closes.

onFocusChange.description: Function called when the focused date changes.

disableLayer.description: Whether to disable the interaction outside logic

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

formattedTime.description: The formatted time parts of the timer count.

progressPercent.description: The progress percentage of the timer.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; area: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the timer parts

countdown.description: Whether the timer should countdown, decrementing the timer on each tick.

startMs.description: The total duration of the timer in milliseconds.

targetMs.description: The minimum count of the timer in milliseconds.

autoStart.description: Whether the timer should start automatically

interval.description: The interval in milliseconds to update the timer count.

onTick.description: Function invoked when the timer ticks

onComplete.description: Function invoked when the timer is completed

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

attrs.description: The attributes of the toast store

create.description: Create a new toast with the given options

update.description: Update an existing toast with new properties

remove.description: Remove a toast by its ID

dismiss.description: Dismiss a toast by its ID. If no ID is provided, dismisses all toasts

error.description: Create an error toast with the given options

success.description: Create a success toast with the given options

info.description: Create an info toast with the given options

warning.description: Create a warning toast with the given options

loading.description: Create a loading toast with the given options

getCount.description: Get the total number of toasts

promise.type: <T>(promise: Promise<T> | (() => Promise<T>), options: Options<V>, "type">) => { id: string; unwrap: () => Promise<T>; }
promise.description: Create a toast that tracks a promise's state

pause.description: Pause a toast's auto-dismiss timer. If no ID is provided, pauses all toasts

resume.description: Resume a toast's auto-dismiss timer. If no ID is provided, resumes all toasts

isVisible.description: Check if a toast with the given ID is currently visible

isDismissed.description: Check if a toast with the given ID has been dismissed

setPressed.description: Sets the pressed state of the toggle.

defaultPressed.description: The default pressed state of the toggle.

pressed.description: The pressed state of the toggle.

onPressedChange.description: Event handler called when the pressed state of the toggle changes.

value.description: The value of the toggle group.

setValue.description: Function to set the value of the toggle group.

getItemState.description: Returns the state of the toggle item.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; item(value: string): string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the toggle. Useful for composition.

value.description: The controlled selected value of the toggle group.

defaultValue.description:
The initial selected value of the toggle group when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected value of the toggle group.

onValueChange.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop focus inside the toggle group.

rovingFocus.description: Whether to use roving tab index to manage focus.

orientation.description: The orientation of the toggle group.

multiple.description: Whether to allow multiple toggles to be selected.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

open.description: Whether the tooltip is open.

ids.type: Partial<{ trigger: string; content: string; arrow: string; positioner: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tooltip. Useful for composition.

openDelay.description: The open delay of the tooltip.

closeDelay.description: The close delay of the tooltip.

closeOnPointerDown.description: Whether to close the tooltip on pointerdown.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the tooltip when the Escape key is pressed.

closeOnScroll.description: Whether the tooltip should close on scroll

closeOnClick.description: Whether the tooltip should close on click

interactive.description:
Whether the tooltip's content is interactive.
In this mode, the tooltip will remain open when user hovers over the content.

onOpenChange.description: Function called when the tooltip is opened.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content

open.description: The controlled open state of the tooltip

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the tooltip when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the open state of the tooltip.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

open.description: Whether the tour is open

stepIndex.description: The index of the current step

hasNextStep.description: Whether there is a next step

hasPrevStep.description: Whether there is a previous step

firstStep.description: Whether the current step is the first step

lastStep.description: Whether the current step is the last step

addStep.description: Add a new step to the tour

removeStep.description: Remove a step from the tour

updateStep.description: Update a step in the tour with partial details

setSteps.description: Set the steps of the tour

setStep.description: Set the current step of the tour

start.description: Start the tour at a specific step (or the first step if not provided)

isValidStep.description: Check if a step is valid

isCurrentStep.description: Check if a step is visible

ids.type: Partial<{ content: string; title: string; description: string; positioner: string; backdrop: string; arrow: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tour. Useful for composition.

stepId.description: The id of the currently highlighted step

onStepChange.description: Callback when the highlighted step changes

onStatusChange.description: Callback when the tour is opened or closed

closeOnInteractOutside.description: Whether to close the tour when the user clicks outside the tour

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the tour when the user presses the escape key

keyboardNavigation.description: Whether to allow keyboard navigation (right/left arrow keys to navigate between steps)

preventInteraction.description: Prevents interaction with the rest of the page while the tour is open

spotlightOffset.description: The offsets to apply to the spotlight

spotlightRadius.description: The radius of the spotlight clip path

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

onPointerDownOutside.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component

onFocusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

onInteractOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

expandedValue.description: The id of the expanded nodes

setExpandedValue.description: Function to set the expanded value

selectedValue.description: The id of the selected nodes

setSelectedValue.description: Function to set the selected value

getVisibleNodes.description: Function to get the visible nodes

expand.description:
Function to expand nodes.
If no value is provided, all nodes will be expanded

collapse.description:
Function to collapse nodes
If no value is provided, all nodes will be collapsed

select.description:
Function to select nodes
If no value is provided, all nodes will be selected

deselect.description:
Function to deselect nodes
If no value is provided, all nodes will be deselected

focus.description: Function to focus an item node

selectParent.description: Function to select the parent node of the focused node

expandParent.description: Function to expand the parent node of the focused node

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; tree: string; label: string; node(value: string): string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the tree elements. Useful for composition.

defaultExpandedValue.description:
The initial expanded node ids when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the expanded node ids.

defaultSelectedValue.description:
The initial selected node ids when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the selected node ids.

focusedValue.description: The id of the focused node

selectionMode.description:
Whether the tree supports multiple selection
- "single": only one node can be selected
- "multiple": multiple nodes can be selected

onExpandedChange.description: Called when the tree is opened or closed

onFocusChange.description: Called when the focused node changes

expandOnClick.description: Whether clicking on a branch should open it or not

typeahead.description: Whether the tree supports typeahead search

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.
